name: HardwireD 1.1
description:
NOTE: When playing in browser, fullscreen is highly recommended for the best experience.

Project Headspace, otherwise known as Jonesy, is finally complete and ready for testing. They're a little android with a unique ability: Living on past their destruction, through those that destroyed them. They'll have to shoot and navigate their way through an obstacle course meant to test their abilities.

Controls:
Arrow Keys or WASD - Move
Left Ctrl or Left Click - Shoot, Interact with objects
Left Alt or Right Click - Aim down sights
Escape - Pause game (Note: Needs to be pressed twice on Browser since the first press just enables the cursor)

Originally made for Wowie Jam 3.0 by Jonas Tyroller

(Note: May or may not feature a plate of spaghetti)
